channel.title: Hearthstone
channel.description:
I started playing this about a week ago, and I've got to say it's pretty fun. For those who don't know, it's a turn based card game produced by Blizzard and supported by Battle.net: http://us.battle.net/hearthstone/en/?-
I'm rank 23 so far and I've been starting to play ranked more and more. If anyone wants to add me as a friend, my battle tag is n10sit#1859. If you haven't already you should definitely give this game a try.
So, priest tank decks can be pretty fun: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L5xhapi.jpg[/img]

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

the beast deck i’ve been using has been working well so far so i’ll probably get up there soon

edit: have used a crappy version of a spellpower rogue that has worked wonders so far

Read full topic

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

honestly if you know about card value and the strengths/weaknesses of what you want to play, you can play pretty much any deck you want and get to at least ~15

Read full topic

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I’ve heard of the zoo deck but I’m not a huge fan. Spellpower rogues are very fun to play with but can be risky in ranked play

Read full topic

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I got to 20 in about 7 games from 25 using the zoolock deck. If you don’t know what that is, its a warlock deck with good low-cost high-value minions.

Read full topic

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I didn’t play in Ranked mode for a while as I tried to learn how to play which is why I’m so low. Which hero do you use? I go between Hunter (beast deck)/Warrior (pirates/murlocs) generally

Read full topic

item.title: Hearthstone
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I got from 25 to 20 in about half an hour yesterday

I don’t really play it much, I just watch streams (Trump) and thats how I learn about decent decks and decent gameplay strategy.

Read full topic
